column5: To all my northern neighbors have a great day!  If your off fishing catch a big one. If your working I share your pain.    Whopper
Happy Back at ya Phil !!!!!  Have a great day.....
Thanks Phil, I'm not doing either today...other than housework   Will be a good day none the less  Maureen
I would also like to wish all Canadians a very special holiday. And to those I know personally, cheers guys and I will hoist one high in your honor today.
Thanks for remembering, Phil. Everyone have a great day wherever you are.
Thanks guys, have a great July 4th celebration........
Thanks Phil. Hope you have a great week and enjoy the holiday on Wednesday.
